MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 14-JAN-2021 02:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the EH26 postcode area of Penicuik. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut and are working to get supplies restored. So far, we have arrived on site and confirmed an underground cable fault on Carlops Crescent. We are bringing additional resources to site to help with restoration and repair and we now expect your supply to be restored by 2am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:50PM on Wednesday 13 January 2021.
